scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd packages/server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev:concurrent: concurrently "turbo run dev --filter=server" "wait-on http://localhost:3001 && turbo run dev --filter=client"
scripts.install:all: NODE_ENV=development npm install && cd packages/client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.gsd:
clear && git status && echo '
' && git diff --cached --unified=3 > staged_changes.txt
scripts.wc: clear && find . -type f \( -name "*.js" -o -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.vue" -o -name "*.json" -o -name "*.md" -o -name "*.scss" -o -name "*.html" \) -not -name "package-lock.json" -not -path "*/node_modules/*" -not -path "*/.git/*" -not -path "*/dist/*" -print0 | xargs -0 wc -w | sort -nr
